GET /accounts/{identifier}/devices/postu.description: List Device Posture Rules for an account.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

count.description: Total number of results for the requested service

page.description: Current page within paginated list of results

per_page.description: Number of results per page of results

total_count.description: Total results available without any search parameters

description.description: The description of the Device Posture Rule.
description.example: The rule for admin serial numbers

expiration.description: Sets the expiration time for a posture check result. If empty, the result remains valid until it is overwritten by new data from the WARP client.

input.description: The value to be checked against.

os_version_extra.description: Product Verison Extra that Mac OS uses (mac only)

checkDisks.description: List of volume names to be checked for encryption.

requireAll.description: Whether to check all disks for encryption.

cn.description: Common Name that is protected by the certificate

match.description: The conditions that the client must match to run the rule.

name.description: The name of the Device Posture Rule.

schedule.description: Polling frequency for the WARP client posture check. Default: `5m` (poll every five minutes). Minimum: `1m`.

type.description: The type of Device Posture Rule.
